attributes.action: how can we live on the money the law says we can live on
attributes.additional_details:
How can we live on the money the law says we can live on you dont take into account about bills like
electric
Gas
Water
Sewage
bedroom tax if appropriate put on old people where needed
Council tax
Food
Clothes
Baby items if appropriate
Tv licence
satellite tv

How can we afford all this on our benefits money when you state the law say you have to live on its
you have to take all this out of it before an see what's left some people are left with £20 to feed a family of 4 for 2 wks so its not the law says to live on its what you say
And its about time you upped our money so we can live better then to struggle like this thats why people are robbing people to make ends meet
Put a stop to it an pay us more money
The law says you have to give us this money to live on an the bills on top then it makes sence
We will get what the law says to live on
